title: Style 'Book Appointment' submit button with bright teal/blue color

requirements.summary: Style the submit button in BookAppointmentDialog with a bright teal or royal-blue background (#0D9488 or equivalent OKLCH token) so it stands out prominently against the white form. The button must have white text, a smooth hover state (slightly darker shade or glow), and a CSS transition of ~200–300ms.
acceptanceCriteria: The submit button inside BookAppointmentDialog has a bright teal or royal-blue background (not white, not grey).
Button text is white and clearly readable against the teal/blue background.
On hover, the button transitions to a slightly darker teal/blue shade or emits a subtle glow, with a CSS transition of approximately 200–300ms.
The rest of the form (inputs, labels, dialog background) remains white/light.
The button styling is consistent across all viewports (desktop and mobile).
No other UI elements are changed by this update.

file_operations.description: Update the submit button styling to use a bright teal background color (using existing design tokens from tailwind.config.js such as bg-teal-500 or the site's #0D9488 teal accent). Apply white text color (text-white), add a hover state with a slightly darker teal shade (e.g., hover:bg-teal-600) or a subtle glow effect, and include a CSS transition property (transition-colors duration-200 or duration-300). Ensure all other form elements (inputs, labels, dialog background) remain unchanged with their existing white/light styling.
